About 🤓

Civic Tech Chat is a podcast covering the civic technology movement. Inspired by FDR’s Fireside Chats, we seek to raise awareness of the work being done by technologists around the world to build a public service infrastructure that works more efficiently and conveniently for all citizens.

ci•vic tech•no•lo•gy (n.): technology (mainly information technology) that enables engagement or participation of the public for stronger development, enhancing citizen communications, improving government infrastructure, and generally improving the public good (wikipedia).

Written, recorded, produced by Ryan Koch.
